name: web-bookmarks
description: 现代化书签管理系统 - 基于 Cloudflare Workers 和 D1

scripts.db:reset: wrangler d1 execute bookmarks-db --local --file=./schema.sql && wrangler d1 execute bookmarks-db --local --file=./migrations/002_add_indexes.sql
scripts.db:reset:remote: wrangler d1 execute bookmarks-db --remote --file=./schema.sql && wrangler d1 execute bookmarks-db --remote --file=./migrations/002_add_indexes.sql
scripts.db:migrate: echo "⚠️  DANGER: Use 'npm run db:reset' if you really want to RESET (WIPE) the database. For incremental changes, stick to manual execution for now."
